alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Kingfisher (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 6:27PM CDT until April 19 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KINGFISHER...SOUTHEASTERN BLAINE AND NORTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Calumet, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingfisher, Geary, Okarche, Calumet, and Omega. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
